roleset.name: cause discomfort
roleset.note: DISCOMFIT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'discomfit' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1, Framenet entry Experiencer obj. (from discomfit.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: boring transitive
example.text: Well, it now turns out that [Mrs. Thatcher]-1 had to travel across the globe to the 49-member Commonwealth summit in Kuala Lumpur *trace*-1 to discomfit the Holy Order of Consensus Builders.
example.arg: the Holy Order of Consensus Builders
